name: Thermal Relief Via
description: Replaces selected via(s) with identical footprint to make thermal relief for soldering.
description_full: This is for DIY circuit boards with vias in copper pour that need to be soldered to. Use this along with the "Do not tent vias" option. I'm soldering a wire from the top to bottom via pad but you can use this to solder eyelets too. The original via is deleted to eliminate repeated drill hits.
